ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Easy way to get plat?
ygData.msgSnippet: Its more of a stun then a fear. ... From: Richard Ong [mailto:nakor@planetwave.net] Sent: Friday, August 03, 2001 7:57 PM To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
ygData.messageBody:
Its more of a stun then a fear.

-----Original Message-----
From: Richard Ong [mailto:nakor@...]
Sent: Friday, August 03, 2001 7:57 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Re: Easy way to get plat?


Yeah... I'd say you'd get slaughtered~~~ heh. they con blue or
yellow at 34+ plus I don't think they give that much money anyway.
And you need good magic resist cuz they can fear you. As for you
clerics, you just need a good group to kill these things. I don't
know many clerics who solo anyway if that's waht you were thinking
(those that are clerics anyway). I'm sure you can do it at 35+
though if you got a good group.

--- In EverQuest@y..., Denis Baldwin <dbaldwin@c...> wrote:
> Well, I was thinking of group against specs. What do you think of
that? Good
> choice @ 19? or will I get slaughtered?
>
